mysql.query: SELECT CONCAT('RE-', CAST(l1.L1_Protocolo AS CHAR)) AS 'id', rr.rr_protURA AS 'verification_code', ex.ex_blob AS 'file' FROM sqlreg3.l1 l1 INNER JOIN sqlreg3.rr rr ON(l1.L1_ProtRecep = rr.Rr_Protocolo) JOIN sqlreg3.ex ex ON ex.Ex_Id = ( SELECT ex.Ex_Id FROM sqlreg3.ex ex WHERE ex.ex_protocolo = l1.L1_Protocolo ORDER BY ex.Ex_Id DESC LIMIT 1 ) WHERE l1.L1_Ativo = 1 AND l1.l1_etapa = 15 AND (rr.rr_protURA IS NOT NULL AND rr.rr_protURA != '')
